item.description:
We hope many of you were able to see the show that was on Biography Channel about the children. It did a good job showing their lives and progress made.

This month we are having a group discussion where we can share our abilities and gain a deeper understanding of them. There will be some practical exercises as well! Children are welcome indeed!

So bring a dish, your company and some conversation to meet others like you and learn more!
item.why: You will be welcomed and accepted for who you are.
item.name: The Worcester Indigo Children and Parents February Meetup
